# Google page clone
- Easy version
 + Build the [Google.com](https://www.google.com/) homepage

- Hard version (optional)
 + Build the [Google.com search result](https://www.google.com/search?sxsrf=ALeKk02K2p8Z-AaJN7Q5M8tYozdUJztnVw%3A1589100497137&ei=0b-3Xsf4B82xmAWhgae4Ag&q=hire+me&oq=hire+me&gs_&sclient=psy-ab&ved=0ahUKEwiHpZPV9KjpAhXNGKYKHaHACScQ4dUDCAw&uact=5)  page.
